message: “The Merrick County Sheriff's Office, posting on Facebook, said human trafficking victims frequent salons often as walk– ins, requesting nails, waxing, makeup or hair services.”

data.description: Your daughter, brother, neighbor or friend. According to experts, anyone one of these people could become a victim of human trafficking. There's an estimated 40. 3 million victims of human trafficking globally according to the International Labor Organization, and here in the U. S. 40,000 cases have...
data.title: Human trafficking victims could be in classrooms or your home
